Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'smoking', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Benjamin Duffield'], 'Producers': ['Kimberley Berlin', 'Susan Schneir', 'Jason Ross Jallet', 'Benjamin Paquette'], 'Starring': ['Nick Krause', 'Molly Parker', 'Juliette Gosselin']}
Review Text: This would have made a much better short story, however, the premise is pretty good.  Interesting that it was made in 2014, and yet is quite relevant to 2020/21 and current times.
Review Title: Meh
Rating: 2.0
